about: Single unit of work tracked on the Execution Board
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

## Task
One-line description of what needs to be done.

## Purpose
Why this task is needed. Keep it short and clear.

## Expected Outcome
What “done” looks like. Must be specific and observable.

## Scope
### Included
- []

### Not Included
- []

## Dependencies / Risks
Anything that could block or delay this task.

## Notes
Links, references, or additional context.

---

### Ready Checklist
- [ ] Owner assigned  
- [ ] Label added  
- [ ] Outcome is clear
